header.title: Atlas
header.filesDescription: Files created by AI in the sandbox
header.terminateTooltip: Stop the session and close the sandbox
header.filesGeneratedHere: Files generated by AI will appear here

chat.startSessionFirst: Start a session first to begin chatting
chat.agentPatience: Agent sometimes takes a while to respond. Please be patient.

artifacts.startSessionDesktop: Start a session to see the desktop

tooltip.enable: Take manual control of the browser
tooltip.enabled: You are in control - click to return to AI
tooltip.disabled: AI is in control - click to take over

messages.enableSuccess: Manual control enabled. You can now operate the browser directly.
messages.disableSuccess: AI control restored. The automation will continue.
messages.disableError: Failed to return control to AI

quickMessages: Open Google and search for artificial intelligence
Visit GitHub and browse trending projects
Open Taobao and search for phones
Visit Baidu and search for today's news
Open YouTube and search for programming tutorials

meta.title: Atlas - AI Browser Controller
meta.description: Chat with AI to control your browser in E2B sandbox
